title: COVID-19 Vaccines - Mesquite Pediatrics - Pediatrics for Family Health
description: Tucson, AZ Pediatrician & family doctor, Mesquite Pediatrics specializes in pediatric medicine for a child's physical, emotional and developmental health. Children's Healthcare for family and kid health in the Mesquite area. Call (520) 648-5437 for an appointment today!
cleaned_text: We have both formulations of the Pfizer vaccine available - for 12 years and up and also for 5-11 years. This includes doses of the Pfizer vaccine for booster/3rd doses, which are now recommended for every on 18 years and older, 6 months after their second dose. We will vaccinate anyone who needs it - they do not have to be a patient of Mesquite Pediatrics. Click the appropriate link below to schedule. - [Pfizer vaccine for 5-11 years](https://hipaa.jotform.com/213218416129148) - [Pfizer vaccine for 12 years and up - November](https://hipaa.jotform.com/213208787622156) - [Pfizer vaccine for 12 years and up - December and January](https://hipaa.jotform.com/213307486528157) We are not offering the Moderna vaccine at this time. Below is more information about the vaccine (that you will also receive when you come for your vaccine). - [Vaccine Recipient Fact Sheet](/storage/app/media/vaccine20recipient20fact20sheet20-20eua20-20moderna20covid-1920vaccine.pdf)- contains information about the Moderna COVID-19 vaccine and about it's Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) from the FDA. - [V-Safe Information](/storage/app/media/v-safe-poster-and-info-sheet.pdf)- information about a vaccine side effect tracking program run by the CDC to help increase our knowledge of side effects of the vaccine. Enrollment in the program is recommended but not required.
